2062700.name: Polyspell
2062700.description:
Overview

Retrosurge is a bullet-hell roguelike where the player controls the waves of the game. Stay as long as you like in a wave or take your awards and cash in in the shop. However, will you be strong enough to kill the onslaught of enemies that arrive next?


Survive

Survive as long as you can and kill the entire onslaught of enemies. Discovered different enemies that randomly spawn in the arenas.


Discover

Discover many different upgrades throughout the shops and create crazy weapons. Discover different types of enemies and bosses.

Challenges

Try to partake in different daily challenges and unlock new upgrades that you can discover in the world.
2062700.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
